attributes.additional_details: Abolish inheritance tax so our children can have start to economical stability from our gifts we leave them.
attributes.background:
I want the government to abolish inheritance tax. Why should my family get taxed on something I have purchased or money I have saved, that has already been taxed on.

we already pay such things as national insurance, council tax, road tax, pensions etc. Our money/earning are taxed enough.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Raise the Inheritance Tax threshold from £325,000 to £1 million: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622532
